title: description
Omarion & Chris Brown & Jhene Aiko's Avi: A loud mix between the Aviation Variation and the Parisian. As loud as Omarion & Chris Brown & Jhene Aiko's ghost.

title: notes
Omarion & Chris Brown & Jhene Aiko's Avi: Bourbon, Grape and a dash of dick.

title: pairing
Omarion & Chris Brown & Jhene Aiko's Avi: Omarion & Chris Brown & Jhene Aiko have it with an ill Chilled Tomato Juice and morning bun.

title: serving_suggestion
Omarion & Chris Brown & Jhene Aiko's Avi: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the ill sounds of Post To Be.
